title.rendered: Memory Foam Square Cushion for Sofa, Bed & Car with Inner Cover (16×16″)

content.rendered:
MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these memory foam Cushions are super comfortable. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The Cushions are made up of 100% pure Visco-Elastic memory foam.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL: 

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the Cushions to become hard in winters.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Retains original shape after each use, Unlike Polyfill/Cotton Cushions our Cushions will not sag.
  • Fits perfectly in the Cushion Covers available in the market.
  • Provide optimum support to the Back and Helps you sit for much longer.
  • Total Value for Money

 

INNER COVER: 

We provide our Cushions with Inner Lining. The basic being a soft material to protect the Cushions.

 

WE ASSURE: 

Our Cushions are made up of 100% filler-free foam. We have tested our Cushions in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our Cushions are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

 

Our Cushions will be tightly rolled packed, kindly cut the plastic carefully and then enjoy your Cushions coming back to its original shape within 24-48 Hours. Memory Foam Cushions may contain air bubbles which may seem as if foam has holes but they are part of moulded foam and they do not affect the quality of the Cushions.

excerpt.rendered: When it is about comfort & quality Lifestyle, Rise & Shine’s Memory Foam Cushions are the perfect choice for you. Style it up with your favourite Cushion Covers and use it at multiple places like Sofa, Chairs, Cars, Bed etc.
